description.translate: Aspire to the best while you still can, for your end will be terrible.

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§5Déclin final\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7Aspire aux meilleurs tant qu'il est\"}","{\"text\":\"§7encore possible, car ta fin sera terrible.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7Aspire to the best while you still can,\"}","{\"text\":\"§7for your end will be terrible.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7STR§a3 §7RES§c-1\"}"]}}
